definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="YourCondition" type="Boolean">YourCondition</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_isremote"/></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:zerosign</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="load_shader"><value name="shader_location"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">minecraft:shaders/post/invert.json</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">NEQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_shader_group"/></value><value name="B"><block type="shader_null"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="take_off_shader"/></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
